overview: " "Total Immersion: Theme Park For the 21st Century" goes behind the scenes to reveal -- at breath-taking pace -- the state-of-the-art technology used to create rides, shows and attractions in the world's newest and most technologically advanced theme park. Exclusive footage helps explain in astonishing detail the incredible inventions created in order to make many of the attractions possible. "
title: Total Immersion - Islands of Adventure
